title: client started repairing patches whilst i loaded up in game
body: Not happy with the situation because its losing me lp that i want back XD

replies.body: If that client has started to repatch it's a pretty decent sign that some of your game files were damaged somehow. With that being the case, it's a good thing the client caught it so that it could attempt to fix that up before you crashed out of further matches. Let that repatch finish it's job, and if it keeps happening in more matches try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **force repatch**.
